results.title: Metformin Attenuates Osteoporosis in Diabetic Patients with Carcinoma in Situ: A Nationwide, Retrospective, Matched-Cohort Study in Taiwan
results.text_hl: This article outlines the potential for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to attenuate the rate of @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_in_Situ</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002278 @@@carcinoma in situ@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_in_Situ</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002278 @@@CIS@@@).

citations.NLM: Lu CH, Chung CH, Kuo FC, Chen KC, Chang CH, Kuo CC, Lee CH, Su SC, Liu JS, Lin FH, Tsao CH, Hsieh PS, Hung YJ, Hsieh CH, Chien WC. Metformin Attenuates Osteoporosis in Diabetic Patients with Carcinoma in Situ: A Nationwide, Retrospective, Matched-Cohort Study in Taiwan J Clin Med. 2020 Sep 2;9(9):. PMID: 32887312

results.title: Metformin represses bladder cancer progression by inhibiting stem cell repopulation via COX2/PGE2/STAT3 axis
results.text_hl: In addition, 3 @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_in_Situ</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002278 @@@CIS lesions@@@ were also seen in the @CHEMICAL_Methylnitrosourea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008770 @@@MNU@@@ group with none of such lesion in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Liu Q, Yuan W, Tong D, Liu G, Lan W, Zhang D, Xiao H, Zhang Y, Huang Z, Yang J, Zhang J, Jiang J. Metformin represses bladder cancer progression by inhibiting stem cell repopulation via COX2/PGE2/STAT3 axis Oncotarget. 2016 May 10;7(19):28235-46. PMID: 27058422

results.title: Metformin can block precancerous progression to invasive tumors of bladder through inhibiting STAT3-mediated signaling pathways
results.text_hl: Upon treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Methylnitrosourea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008770 @@@MNU@@@-induced @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were only detected with @DISEASE_Retinal_Dysplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D015792 @@@dysplasia@@@, @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Papillary @DISEASE_MESH:D002291 @@@papillary tumors@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_in_Situ</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002278 @@@CIS@@@.

citations.NLM: Pan Q, Yang GL, Yang JH, Lin SL, Liu N, Liu SS, Liu MY, Zhang LH, Huang YR, Shen RL, Liu Q, Gao JX, Bo JJ. Metformin can block precancerous progression to invasive tumors of bladder through inhibiting STAT3-mediated signaling pathways J Exp Clin Cancer Res. 2015 Aug 7;34(1):77. PMID: 26245871

results.title: Antidiabetic Drug Metformin Prevents Progression of Pancreatic Cancer by Targeting in Part Cancer Stem Cells and mTOR Signaling.
results.text_hl: Both doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ decreased @DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@pancreatic tumor@@@ weights by 34% to 49% (P < 0.03-0.001).

citations.NLM: Mohammed A, Janakiram NB, Brewer M, Ritchie RL, Marya A, Lightfoot S, Steele VE, Rao CV. Antidiabetic Drug Metformin Prevents Progression of Pancreatic Cancer by Targeting in Part Cancer Stem Cells and mTOR Signaling. Transl Oncol. 2013 Dec 1;6(6):649-59. PMID: 24466367
